claim().details: anyone can call this function to transfer unlocked tokens to the wallet

params._newWallet: new address of wallet that will receive unlocked tokens

UNLOCK_AMOUNT().notice: amount of tokens that will be unlocked per month

UNLOCK_CYCLE().notice: tokens will be unlocked per this cycle

blocksPerMonth().notice: blocks per month by assuming 4 blocks per minute

wallet().notice: address that will receive unlocked tokens
